content: Create a markdown table of 5 tallest buildings

| Building Name | Height (m) | Height (ft) | Location | Year Completed |
|---------------|------------|-------------|----------|----------------|
| Burj Khalifa | 828 | 2,717 | Dubai, UAE | 2010 |
| Shanghai Tower | 632 | 2,073 | Shanghai, China | 2015 |
| Makkah Royal Clock Tower | 601 | 1,972 | Mecca, Saudi Arabia | 2012 |
| Ping An Finance Center | 599 | 1,965 | Shenzhen, China | 2017 |
| Lotte World Tower | 554.5 | 1,819 | Seoul, South Korea | 2017 |
Add a column for Year Built

| Building Name | Height (m) | Height (ft) | Location | Year Completed | Year Built |
|---------------|------------|-------------|----------|----------------|------------|
| Burj Khalifa | 828 | 2,717 | Dubai, UAE | 2010 | 2004-2010 |
| Shanghai Tower | 632 | 2,073 | Shanghai, China | 2015 | 2008-2015 |
| Makkah Royal Clock Tower | 601 | 1,972 | Mecca, Saudi Arabia | 2012 | 2004-2012 |
| Ping An Finance Center | 599 | 1,965 | Shenzhen, China | 2017 | 2010-2017 |
| Lotte World Tower | 554.5 | 1,819 | Seoul, South Korea | 2017 | 2011-2017 |
Remove Height in feet and add a column for Floors

| Building Name | Height (m) | Location | Year Completed | Year Built | Floors |
|---------------|------------|----------|----------------|------------|--------|
| Burj Khalifa | 828 | Dubai, UAE | 2010 | 2004-2010 | 163 |
| Shanghai Tower | 632 | Shanghai, China | 2015 | 2008-2015 | 128 |
| Makkah Royal Clock Tower | 601 | Mecca, Saudi Arabia | 2012 | 2004-2012 | 120 |
| Ping An Finance Center | 599 | Shenzhen, China | 2017 | 2010-2017 | 115 |
| Lotte World Tower | 554.5 | Seoul, South Korea | 2017 | 2011-2017 | 123 |
